mapper.select: select emp_id, account, pwd, real_name , sex, nationality, id_card_num, dob, hire_date ,address, telephone , duty from ( select e.* , row_number() over() rn from employee e) t where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.insert: insert into employee (emp_id, account, pwd, real_name , sex, nationality, id_card_num, dob, hire_date ,address, telephone , duty) values(SQ_EMPNO.nextval, #{account}, #{pwd}, #{realName}, #{sex} , #{nationality}, #{idCardNum}, #{dob}, sysdate, #{address} , #{telephone}, #{duty})

sql.if: and (account = #{condition} or real_name like '%${condition}%' or sex = #{condition} or nationality = #{condition} or id_card_num = #{condition} or to_char(dob,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{condition} or to_char( hire_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') = #{condition} or address = #{condition} or telephone = #{condition} or duty = #{condition})
